mapper.select: select c.g_seq, c.member_id, c.g_arrive, c.g_leave, c.g_status, m.depart_code, m.rank_code, m.member_name, m.member_status, m.member_vacation from commuting c, member m where c.member_id = m.member_id order by m.depart_code asc, m.rank_code
mapper.update: update commuting set g_arrive = sysdate where member_id = #{member_id}
update member set member_status = 1 where member_id = #{member_id}
update commuting set g_leave = sysdate where member_id = #{member_id}
update member set member_status = 0 where member_id = #{member_id}
